participant_1.background:
I moved because I wanted to be closer to my new love.
i dyed my hair pink.
i am very good at math and science.
I joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico to continue my athletic pursuits.
My dog is my best friend and the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness.

participant_2.background:
I'm not sure I could be a professional dog walker if I were blind because I wouldn't be able to see where the dogs are going.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
cooking is my passion.
My family is very supportive of my sleep schedule and my need for exercise.

content.text: Hey there! I'm new to the neighborhood, and I'm looking for some new friends. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, and I'm also really into exercise. I'm a professional dog walker, so I get a lot of exercise every day.
That sounds really fun! I'm not very good at cooking, but I'm trying to learn. I'm also a big fan of exercise. I just joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico.
That's great! What kind of exercises do you like to do?
I like to do a lot of different things, but I really enjoy running and lifting weights.
I love running too! It's a great way to clear your head.
I know, right? It's also really good for your heart.
I agree! It's one of the best things you can do for your health.
I'm glad we have something in common. What else do you like to do?
I love to spend time with my dog. He's my best friend and the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness.
I love dogs! They're the best companions.
They are! I'm so glad I have him in my life.
Me too! I'm sure he's glad to have you in his life too.
Well, it's been nice talking to you. I hope we can get to know each other better.
Me too! It was nice talking to you
